{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DAP-2590 |revision=A2 |upc=790069316043 |asin=B001G5W62S |fcc_date=06/20/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=access point |fcc_id=RRKWMPND03 |ic_id=4833A-WMPND03 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5010;CN5010, 400, BG564, SCP, G; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV128DBT2I-90Q |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5PS1G1631C |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP1 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 5-pin header,, populated,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_module=Alpha Networks WMP-ND03 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9160 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR9106 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=IEEE 802.3af PD Controller w/integrated DC/DC;TI;TPS23750;;1;,,, PLL-based Clock Generator;IDT;ICS30S07AIL;;1;,,, 600mA CMOS LDO Regulator;AME;AME8807;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-And Gate;TI;SN74HC08;;1;,,, 3A, 4MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Richtek;RT8004;;2;,,, 150V Power MOSFET;International Rectifier;IRF7541;;1;,,, 60V Power MOSFET;International Rectifier;IRF7478;;1;,,, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.1;Development build v0.11 |stock_os=Linux;2.6.16.26;Cavium-Octeon |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=dlink |default_ssid_regex=^dlink$ |default_ip=192.168.0.50 |default_user=admin |oui=14:D6:4D, 1C:AF:F7, |oui_eth=14:D6:4D, IC:AF:F7, }} '''AirPremier N Dual Band PoE Access Point'''
[http://www.dlink.com/us/en/support/product/dap-2590-wireless-n-dual-band-poe-access-point Product page] :[http://www.dlink.com/-/media/Business_Products/DAP/DAP%202590/Manual/DAP%202590_Manual_v120_EN_US.pdf Manual] :[http://www.dlink.com/-/media/Business_Products/DAP/DAP%202590/Datasheet/DAP_2590_Datasheet_EN_US.pdf Datasheet]
Additional specifications, per '''D-Link''''s datasheet, follow... *Antenna gain **4 dBi @ 2.4GHz **6 dBi @ 5GHz *Max. Output Power **15 dBm @ 2.4GHz **17 dBm @ 5GHz *Max. EIRP **23.7 dBm @ 2.4GHz **26.7 dBm @ 5GHz *Max. Power Consumption: 12.5W *Dimensions (WxHxD): [[Dimensions::165 mm x 43 mm x 186 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::762 g]] / [[Weight::1.7 lbs]]
Default settings (including the SSID) are per '''D-Link''''s manual.
